org.apache.synapse
Class HeaderType

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.synapse.HeaderType
public class HeaderType
extends java.lang.Object

This class encapsulates access to headers. It has a set of "logical names" (e.g. strings) Once you have set the logical name you can read and write that header on a SynapseMessage It is used by the RegexProcessor and the HeaderProcessor classes.
